intents.name: greeting
responses: Hello, thanks for visiting
Good to see you again
Hi there, how can I help?

intents.name: goodbye
responses: See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.

intents.name: thanks
responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

intents.name: date
patterns: could you please tell me what date is today?
responses: I need a acction for the intent date.
Could be useful have responses with patterns. Don't you?

intents.name: time
responses: We're open every day 9am-9pm
Our hours are 9am-9pm every day

intents.name: weather
patterns: Could you tell me the weather forecast?
responses: if is not windy, good weather.
I you can se the sun it is a glorious day.

intents.name: ping
patterns: I want to ping a machine?
I want to know if a machine is on.
responses: Could you please tell me the identity of the machine.
Tell me the internet address or the domain name.

intents.name: IP
responses: My internet address is 192.168.1.11
The IP of this machine is 192.168.1.11

intents.name: chabotExecute
responses: Please, tell me the name or number of the chatbot.
Could you please give me the identification of the chatbot

intents.name: chatbotList
responses: The list of chatbots is this: mopets, shopping list, tasks list.
